Articles.Content:
I am not getting a single contract in any career mode save, I have tried making quite a few and time accelerating, but nothing will make contracts appear in mission control. The save is definitely on career, and the game is definitely on 0.24, so I'm not sure what is going on. Help would be appreciated.

Edited July 18, 2014 by timx222
Was the save created before .24? I'm not sure that .23.5 career saves are treated as 'career' or if they are 'science'.

The save was created in 0.24, and I made a couple of others to double and triple check it wasn't just that save file. I've already tried verifying the cache as well on steam, and while it did find files missing, that didn't fix it.

Are You using any mod ?

Are you looking for contracts in the right place (little building left of VAB) ?

Every new 0.24 carreer save starts with 4 contracts
Ok, looks like I had to reinstall the game to get it to work. Thanks for all the help guys, I really appreciate it.

are you getting "no" contracts or "no new" contracts? The first couple contracts are static, and I think you have to complete at least some of static starting contracts before the new procedural ones start popping up.

So if you're not getting any contracts (including the static contracts), then you may want to reinstall.

If you're not getting NEW contracts, then you may have to complete more static contracts.

EDIT: Ninja'd by the OP. lol.
